txt.en: The trolls here are resting before a final march to haul the siege-weapons to Helm's Gate and beyond. You should do your best to stall them by thinning their numbers.
You have defeated a number of troll-pullers in Shatorthum, hopefully stalling the march of the siege-weapons towards Helm's Deep.
The trolls here are resting before a final march to haul the siege-weapons to Helm's Gate and beyond. You should do your best to stall them by thinning their numbers.
You have defeated a number of troll-pullers in Shatorthum, hopefully stalling the march of the siege-weapons towards Helm's Deep.
Trolls can be found in Shatorthum to the north-west of Marton.\n\nYou should defeat the trolls of Shatorthum.
